title: Interpretation of seeing a nail in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a nail in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: Seeing a nail in a dream indicates that man whom people turn to to speak on their behalf to those who are with others. He also said that it is a symbol of a gentle man. A dream about nails contains rust. It indicates a corrupt and useless man. Seeing the humiliation of an iron nail even the police. A screw made of GoldIt refers to the legal or the world. Seeing nails in a dream means goodness. A dream of obtaining a large number of nails indicates earning a broad livelihood. The meaning of seeing a nail in a dream for a single woman is the only girl who dreams of seeing healthy nails, which is an indication of the presence of an intermediary to reach his goal and achieve it. But if it is a twisted screw, it is a sign That the broker is a hypocrite and a liar. Anyone who sees him cleaning the house and finds a nail is a sign that he will meet a generous man. It may indicate marriage soon by a respectable and respectable man. If he sees that he found a nail while cleaning the house but threw it in the garbage, it symbolizes that she will meet someone she does not love and break off her relationship with him. The meaning of seeing a nail in a dream for a married woman. The nail in a married woman’s dream indicates a person whom she depends on in managing the affairs of her home. Seeing a large straight screw indicates a loyal and upright husband in his life. The straight path shows a good and righteous son with his parents. Seeing a nail made of gold. In reality, it indicates a father. Interpretation of seeing a nail in a dream for a pregnant woman. Dreaming about seeing many nails in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of kindness to her. Seeing a pregnant woman picking up a nail in her dream symbolizes giving birth to a boy. The meaning of seeing a nail in a dream for a man. The road in a man’s dream shows his personality. The dream of removing the nail In a dream, it symbolizes cunning and deception. Seeing a leg screw indicates travel. Add the dream you would like to interpret, with reference to your marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Detailed interpretation of a dream about ants by Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about ants in a dream by Al-Osaimi. Interpretation of dreams: ants in a dream. It is evidence of a child if it is seen in bed. If the dreamer is sick and sees in a dream ants coming out of his mouth, then this is a sign of goodness and it is one of those benign visions that are best left unrevealed. Interpretation of a dream about ants for single people Al-Osaimi if seen Girl: If ants enter the house with food in a dream, this indicates kindness and abundant nutrition. Seeing a large amount of ants in a dream, this is an indication of good offspring for money and children that she will have in the future. Ants leaving the house with food is evidence that he will be exposed to some problems and financial crises. Girl An unmarried woman dreams of ants walking on her body, and this indicates that she is facing many problems, as some speak badly about her. A dream of ants in a married woman’s dream according to Al-Osaimi. If a married woman sees ants entering the house with an amount of food, this indicates the goodness that she will obtain in the coming period. It could be The presence of ants in the house in a dream is a sign of the presence of a wide and abundant diet. As for ants leaving a quantity of food from a married woman’s house in a dream, this indicates marital problems and instability in the marriage. The exit of ants from the body can indicate unpleasant events, The dreamer should not reveal them and make many appeals to restore fate. If she sees ants in the bed, this is good news about pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about ants for a pregnant woman: Killing ants in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates unhappy events. A dream about seeing a large number of ants in a dream may indicate The dream indicates that you will be blessed with many offspring. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a deer in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a deer in a dream about Al-Asami. Interpretation of dreams: Deer in a dream: It indicates the beginning of a new life full of goodness and happiness. As for seeing a deer in a single person’s dream, this indicates his marriage in the near future. But if one sees in a dream the antlers of a deer, this is evidence of a generous character. As for seeing antlers Deer in different shapes in a dream are a reference to a bad omen and are one of the unpleasant visions. Interpretation of a dream about a deer in one dream. If an unmarried girl sees a deer in a dream, this indicates her lover. A deer in a dream shows the girl’s honor and the good morals that characterize her. As for an unmarried girl Whoever sees the blood of a deer in her dream, this is a sign that if she follows it, she will marry her lover. Eating deer meat in a dream indicates abundant and very good nutrition. Interpretation of a dream about a deer for a married woman: A deer in a married woman’s dream is a sign of happiness and good luck. Seeing a dead deer in a dream indicates The problems that you face and your preoccupation with them. As for a woman who dreams that she is eating deer meat, this is evidence that she will be exposed to treachery and treachery. Interpretation of a dream about a deer in a pregnant woman’s dream: If a pregnant woman sees a spinner in a dream, and its shape is beautiful, then this is good news for her that she will give birth to a very beautiful baby girl. A dream indicates A deer in a dream also indicates that this woman will give birth easily. As for seeing a stray deer, it indicates the stress of labor. Interpretation of a dream about a deer in a man’s dream: A beautiful-looking deer in a dream indicates positive changes in the life of the dreamer. As for seeing a dream about deer, it is a sign of events An unpleasant experience that the dreamer experiences. title: Interpretation of hunting in a dream: Seeing a dream that pigeons and birds are being hunted

preview.html: Contents: Dream of fishing with a rod, hunting birds, a hunting gun on the ground, in the hand, in the dream of an unmarried girl, a married woman and a pregnant woman Interpretation of seeing fishing in a dream Whoever dreams that he is looking at a large fish at the bottom of the water, a river or a pond, and he catches and eats as he pleases, indicates that he will be struck with money, treasure and abundance. Whoever sees that he is fishing in a dream and takes the fish out of the well, he is like me. And if a person sees himself fishing in a cloudy lake, this dream does not benefit him or benefit him. Whoever sees in a dream that he is catching only a large fish, this is a sign of kindness and benefit. And the dream of the same person catching a fish without scales indicates deception in taking people's money and cheating on it, and it also indicates deception or complicating or facilitating his affairs. Whoever dreams of catching a brown fish, and in reality the dreamer wants to share a certain interest with someone, this indicates reconciliation between partners. Whoever dreams that he looks at the bottom of the water and sees a dead fish, the dream indicates that its owner will not achieve his desire and his desire will not be fulfilled. Whoever sees in a dream a fish in his bed or sleeps In it, this indicates his illness if he is a fisherman. Anyone who fishes in the water will also be disturbed. Whoever dreams that he catches fish in pure, clean water, it is good for him and his child, if it is the child’s food, and if he fishes in salty water, the opposite. Whoever dreams of eating salted fish indicates fatigue and anxiety, and the opposite was said. Whoever sees in his dream a fish in his bed and he is in the depths of the sea fishing and then the dreamer drowns. Whoever sees that he is looking at fried fish, this indicates that his call has been answered. Whoever sees that there are a lot of fish in front of him in the market, and he buys a fish, this indicates that he will buy a slave, and if the fish is in a place other than the market or unknown, and he buys a fish, then he will marry. Whoever sees that he eats a spoiled, rotten fish and leaves good food and fresh fish, this indicates that the dreamer will come to a forbidden woman and leave a legitimate marriage. Whoever sees that he is asking for a fish or a whale and cannot get them, the dream indicates that he will be indebted to a person and deny his money and his right. Whoever sees that he is looking at a lake or sea and finds a large whale inside it opens His mouth in one direction imprisons the owner of the vision. Whoever sees that he opens the fish and takes out a pearl or two, he earns money from his wife, or gives birth to a son or twins from her, and they are just and righteous. And whoever sees in a dream that a fish comes out of his mouth indicates that the dream is that he speaks about a woman in her honor with impossible words, and that he persecutes her in his jaws. And whoever dreams of catching fish from land or land, this indicates that he committed obscenity and indecency. If the owner of the dream sees dogs returning from fishing, this is evidence of the disappearance of fear and panic. If the sleeper sees that he has caught a bird or caught it for other than hunting or eating, the woman or the maid flies. If the owner of the dream sees that he is fishing or catching fish from the sea, this indicates legitimacy and the search for good food. If a man dreams that he is fishing and he is single, he will marry, and if the dreamer is married, he will have a male child. If the dreamer sees that he is fishing while he is young, this indicates what he has memorized from knowledge and art. If he sees

title: Interpretation of seeing a white falcon in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a white falcon in a dream symbolizes many things, including personal strength and stability in life.To see a white falcon in an unmarried woman’s dreamSee the pointThe white falcon in Ibn Sirin’s dream is kindness, blessing, and good news.If one sees a white falcon in a dream, it is It is good for him that his business will grow, prosper, and earn a lot of money in the coming period. This vision also shows that the dreamer got rid of some of the problems and crises that were bothering him in his life, and noticed that his life will change quickly for the better in the coming period. This vision also indicates facilitating his business and trade in a way It allows him to calm and calm his mind. If the dreamer is sick, then seeing a white falcon in a dream heralds recovery, safety, and better health, God willing. Seeing a white falcon in any form indicates relief and a change in the dreamer’s condition for the better. Interpretation of a dream about a falcon in a single woman’s dream: The falcon indicates in The dream of an unmarried girl indicates that she will enjoy strength and success in her work or studies. It also confirms her readiness to face all the battles and crises that she faces in her life and succeed in overcoming them. To see a falcon in a dream for single people promises her good news that she will achieve a great victory in her life, God willing. This victory may be her marriage to a man. He holds a high position in the state and enjoys wealth and generosity. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is pushing hawks out of her way, this is evidence that something or someone is causing her problems and harming her in her life, and that she wants to get rid of it with everything she has. . . Possible. Interpretation of seeing fear of a falcon in a dream. See the point. Fear of a falcon in a dream. The dreamer’s feeling of lack of comfort and stability in his life. It also indicates that the dreamer commits many sins and forbidden things in his life, so this vision is considered a warning to him to hasten his repentance to God Almighty and not neglect him. If she sees For an unmarried girl, she is afraid of a hawk in a dream. This is a sign that she will miss a wonderful business opportunity. Point: See the fear of the hawk. It has multiple family problems in the dreamer’s life. Some interpretations explain this vision by the presence of some bad moral qualities that characterize the visions. Likewise, the vision of the fear of A falcon may indicate the loss of one of the monarch’s loved ones, and God knows best. See also: - Interpretation of a dream about hunting in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man. A falcon attack in a dream. In Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation, if a person sees in a dream that a falcon is attacking him and attacking him quickly, this may be a sign of a quick death. In addition, there is a competition between the dreamer and the oppressor, and the amount of damage that the dreamer will receive from a hawk attack in the dream is the same amount of damage that he will actually receive from this unjust person. This vision also indicates the presence of conflict and strife in the dreamer’s life over power or A certain position, and the dreamer fears losing this position due to the strength of his opponent. However, if the vision is governed by the survival of the survivor of the falcon attack without damage or minor injuries, in

title: Interpretation of dreaming of thunder in a dream and hearing its sound

preview.html: Thunder often occurs in winter, which is the collision of clouds laden with clouds and electrical charges, which leads to the appearance of this terrifying sound in the sky. It is replaced by cold air and clouds begin to gather through it, but what about seeing thunder in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about thunder in a dream The interpretation of this vision varies from one person to another and from one social status to another. We cannot apply all interpretations at all to all people. The meaning of thunder for one person may indicate relief, and it may indicate a warning to another person, and thus the interpretation differs in its interpretation, but the timing may occur, and there is also a difference in interpretation. Explained by scholars Seeing thunder in a dream without rain indicates fear and anxiety and may foretell a threat and threat that may befall a person from the rulers. But the dream came directly to the seer. If the person who hears thunder is in debt, then this dream is good news indicating that he will pay off the debt, and the difference in the time in which the vision of thunder occurs leads to a difference in interpretation, as: Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing thunder on the second day of September indicates the occurrence of poverty and famine at the beginning of the year and the provision of abundant and plentiful food at the end of the year. Seeing thunder in a dream for Ibn Sirin The sound of thunder in a dream indicates the threat of the ruler and the fear of the seer from him. Whoever recites Surat Al-Raad in a dream, this indicates the remembrance of God and the glory of God and his closeness to God Almighty. It announces the good times and good memory that a person goes through, because the appearance of thunder is by the command of God Almighty. Seeing it in the sky is evidence of the issuance of orders from the ruler, and if it is followed by rain, it indicates that the ruler brings good to the ruling class, but it is stipulated that the rain does not harm or affect the person. Surrounding places. If thunder is accompanied by rain that harms the dreamer or those around him, this may indicate the emergence of some problems at work. If thunder occurs at sunrise and without rain, this brings good news to the dreamer. If thunder is accompanied by pitch darkness and majestic sounds, this may indicate the spread of some harmful weather pests such as locusts and others, or the occurrence of severe cold and winds, or the occurrence of an epidemic and the death of infected people. That is because the vision in general does not bring good. Seeing thunder for a prisoner is evidence of his release. Only the sound of thunder in a dream indicates disputes and disagreements. Thunder in a single woman's dream The sound of thunder in dreams Most dream interpreters unanimously agreed that the sound of thunder in an unmarried woman's dream is interpreted in two different ways, according to the girl's vision and feeling of the appearance of thunder: First person: If the sound of thunder is terrifying and terrifying, this indicates the girl who is afraid of the sound of thunder: The instability of the psychological state of the single woman, as it is a sign of anxiety and excessive anxiety about the future. If the girl is a student, this indicates her excessive anxiety in the academic process and her fear of not passing the exams. The girl's preoccupation with many negative thoughts can ignite the fire of anger inside her and harm herself with her negative outlook and

title: Interpretation of confessing love in a dream: Seeing the sincerity of a loved one in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream of someone confessing their love, someone saying I love you, someone confessing their love to you to single women. Someone says they love me in a dream. If you see in a dream that you are confessing your love to another person, this is a sign that you feel comfortable in the environment in which you live and that the person to whom you are confessing your love is a source of comfort in Your real life. The dream of confessing love indicates the success that you seek to achieve in real life, especially if the dreamer sees in a dream that there is someone confessing his great love to him. Among the most prominent meanings carried by the interpretation of the dream about confessing love are unexpected problems, especially if the dreamer sees In his dream that he confesses his love to another person and that the latter did not accept his love, this is a clear indication of major problems and failure in new projects. Whoever sees in his dream that he confessed his love to another person and that the other revealed his love to him, then this is a sign of the approaching date of his marriage or serious connection with someone. Suitable, and if he is single, this is a sign that she will soon meet the right person. If the dreamer sees during his sleep that he is confessing his love to another in the presence of a large number of people, this is an indication that he will be able to quickly find a solution to the major professional problems he faces at work, and others will be happy. By working with this proposed solution. If the dreamer gets married and sees his partner confessing his love for him, this is a sign of the great happiness they experience in their married life and may indicate the wife’s pregnancy and childbirth. Love in a dream means worries, distress, blindness, and deafness, and love is an experience in waking life, and fame requires people to To sympathize with him, and it indicates poverty and death for the patient. Perhaps death in a dream indicates love and distance from the beloved, and the afterlife is a continuation of the beloved with the beloved, and cauterization and burning in a dream is love. Entering Paradise in a dream is a connection with the beloved, and the continuation of the beloved with the beloved, just as entering Hell in a dream is division, passion and love in a dream are neglect and lack of religion, and love is corruption. In religion and lack of money. Loving God Almighty in a dream means empowerment in religion, good trust, and following the Sunnah of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. This may indicate having a child, divorce, lack of money, and estrangement of siblings. Perhaps this indicates hunger, various diseases, or trips to distant, dangerous places. If in the dream he claims love or passion, he is lost after being guided. If the soothsayer knows, then he has bewitched people with his traps, and violated the rules of their rationality. If the soothsayer is sad, his rank will rise, and he will become famous. His narration, and his argument appeared, and became more certain, in religion and in the world, and if it is modern in Islam, then the image of his religion and belief is strong. If you dream that you like something, this indicates the conviction of your current environment. If you dream that the love of others fills you with happy omens, then successful things will affirm you and free you from the troubles of life. If you dream that your love has failed or that it is only on your side, then you will feel despair over a conflicting question that will appear in your mind and make you wonder whether it is better to change your lifestyle Or marriage and trust in fate. To advance in the future. If a husband or wife dreams of a...

title: I know the most important signs of a jinn attack in a dream

preview.html: A jinn attack in a dream. Seeing a jinn attacking you in a dream is one of the frightening dreams that causes panic and anxiety to those who see it. In the following lines, we will explain the details so that the reader is not distracted between the different interpretations. Jinn attack in a dream. Seeing the jinn attacking the dreamer in a dream indicates that he is deviating from the right path and following the temptations and temptations of the world that prevent him from entering Paradise and is exposed to the severe wrath of his Lord and his attack on the Jinn. The sleeping person in a dream shows the tribulations and sorrows that he will be exposed to because of swindlers and their desire to eliminate him in order to obtain a working machine. Seeing a jinn attack in a woman’s dream indicates bad news that she will hear about in the coming days, and a jinn attack in the dreamer’s sleep symbolizes his entry into an irreconcilable relationship. He should end it instead of feeling. Anxiety and pain due to lack of understanding. Jinn attack in a dream by Ibn Shirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing the dreamer abusing the jinn in a dream indicates that he falls into magic and envy because of his superiority in life and that he will achieve his desires in a short time. She will suffer from it in the next few days due to her weak personality and her inability to act in difficult situations and the pitfalls she is exposed to. Seeing the jinn being insulted in a dream leads to her failure in school due to her interest in things that do not benefit her, her straying with bad friends, and actions that are contrary to Sharia and religion. Children about the law and religion and applying them in their lives to be good for society. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world, just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. The jinn attacks a single woman’s dream. Seeing the jinn attacking an unmarried woman in a dream It indicates the family disputes that she will be exposed to due to her reluctance to marry, which may lead her to a bad psychological state that leads to a serious health crisis. Time passed for her. Watching a jinn attack in a girl’s dream leads to her marrying a man with a weak character and bad character, and he will become worse than him in the last years of her life because of her naivety in fateful situations. The Abyss. A jinn attacks a married woman in a dream. Seeing a jinn attacking a married woman in a dream indicates marital strife and the problems she will face due to the interference of others in the details of her life, which may lead to creating a major rift between her and her husband. . It may lead to their separation, and she is on her way to excel because of the meanness and resentment that she will soon suffer from her colleagues. Witnessing a jinn attack in a dream leads the dreamer to fall under the influence of magic and may lead to them failing in school due to the deterioration of their health condition. Care must be taken to avoid disasters, and wrestling with... Jeans in the dreamer. The dream symbolizes the family disputes that will arise between her and her husband’s family, and the estrangement between them will likely end. A jinn attacks a pregnant woman in a dream. Seeing a jinn attacking a pregnant woman in a dream means that she will face difficulties in childbirth and severe pain that she will suffer from neglecting the instructions and directions of the doctor.

title: Interpretation of a dream about embracing one’s mother in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about embracing one’s mother in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The strongest and truest human feeling of love is a mother’s love for her children, and in a dream a person can see the embrace in different details, and interpretations vary depending on these details. Interpretation of a dream about a mother embracing in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In a dream, a married woman hugging her husband and children indicates family cohesion and interconnectedness between family members. Seeing a mother hugging her children in a dream means happy news that the dreamer will hear soon. Seeing a married woman hugging her son in a dream shows her extreme fear of him and her willingness to protect him. When a married woman sees herself hugging her deceased mother in a dream, this is a sign of understanding and happiness that will continue between her and her husband. Embrace The student’s dead mother and carrying him in a dream until he wakes up from his sleep indicates his approaching death and his moving to his deceased father in Trend’s house, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hugging from behind in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In a general girl’s dream, seeing someone she does not know hugging her from behind indicates emotional emptiness. Which the girl is experiencing at this time in her life. A married woman seeing someone she does not know hugging him from behind indicates that this woman is overcoming some of the wrong things that are happening in her life. When a divorced woman dreams that a stranger is hugging her from behind, this is an indication of achieving The desire that she wanted and desired so badly. When a man sees that he is hugging a beautiful woman from behind, this is a sign of many wonderful things happening in the life of the fortuneteller. Seeing a pregnant woman whom he does not know hugging her from behind in her sleep is evidence of an easy birth, and God knows best. Interpretation Ibn Sirin’s dream of a husband hugging his wife in a dream. In a dream, seeing a man hugging his wife from behind shows the intense love that a man feels for his wife. A man who dreams of embracing another woman besides his wife in a dream is an indication of a lot of money and good things that he will get. In his life. Seeing a man hugging his wife in a dream means the love and happiness that the dreamer experiences. Seeing a man hugging his wife in a dream means that the dreamer has great confidence in his wife and that life between them will go well and completely. When a divorced woman sees that he is hugging his ex-wife in his dream, this indicates the nobleman’s regret for what What he did to his wife and his desire to return to her again, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about embracing a stranger in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The common girl who believes that she is hugging a stranger in her dream is a sign of the emotional emptiness she is experiencing and her desire to enter into a new love relationship. Seeing a stranger hugging in a dream It indicates the caution that a student must take when dealing with strangers. To dream of a divorced woman embracing a stranger is a sign of good news that she has received and that God will reward her with kindness in her life. When a pot dreams that she is embracing someone she does not know, this means that she will soon marry a good person who has good qualities. Good. In a dream, seeing a stranger embracing the viewer and not having any relationship indicates the existence of a relationship between the two people in touch

title: Interpretation of seeing the walls of a house in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing the walls of a house in a dream, or the walls of a house or the walls are what surrounds the house and makes it closed and protects the person inside it, and seeing the walls of the house in a dream can indicate goodness, or it may be a warning or warning of the emergence of evil, and interpreters have differed in their interpretation of seeing walls The home, whether for a single, married, pregnant or divorced woman of all kinds. Today’s meanings, through the Ruya website, we discuss the interpretation of seeing the walls of a house in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing the walls of a house by Ibn Sirin. Seeing the dreamer riding a wall in a dream indicates his religiosity and wealth. Seeing a wall Falling in a dream: It indicates that the dreamer gets a lot of money and may acquire a great treasure. Seeing her sitting on the wall wearing a golden bracelet indicates that the viewer gets a lot of money. Looking at the brick wall is an indication that the dreamer is doing good deeds. Seeing the wall falling in the house is an indication of... The family is exposed to illness. Seeing cleaning a wall in a dream indicates progress in work and reaching higher positions. Interpretation of seeing a wall in one dream. See climbing a wall for individuals. It indicates superiority and brilliant success. Seeing building a wall for a single woman in a dream indicates her marriage and establishing a new home. Interpretation of seeing a wall in a dream For a married woman: Seeing the construction of a wall in a dream for a married woman indicates a new pregnancy for her. Seeing a wall in a dream for a married woman indicates the stability of her married life. A married woman sees her husband building a wall in a dream. News of a new baby appears. Interpretation of seeing a wall for a man: To see yourself climbing a wall in a dream for a man: It symbolizes the presence of Someone who supports him and always stands by him. Seeing a wall being built in a man’s dream announces the marriage of a bachelor. Seeing a man building a wall between himself and his neighbor shows that there will be a genealogical relationship between the two families. Seeing a wall falling in a man’s dream indicates failure, betrayal, and defeat for him. Seeing a man falling from a wall And he breaks his arm. It shows that he will lose a member of his family. Interpretation of seeing yourself climbing a wall in a dream. I see myself climbing a wall in a dream. It indicates perseverance and effort on the dreamer to achieve his goals and fulfill his desires. Seeing a woman climbing a wall in a dream indicates the stability of her marital life. Seeing a man climbing the wall indicates his acquaintance with a man. Another high-ranking person had a great influence on his life. Interpretation of seeing you building a wall in a dream. Seeing you building a wall in a dream indicates establishing projects and making many profits from them. Seeing you building a wall in a dream indicates achieving ambitions and goals, marriage to an unmarried man and a child from a married or pregnant woman. Interpretation of a vision A broken wall in a dream. Seeing the demolition of a wall in a dream indicates the removal of the ruler from his authority. Seeing the wall collapsing and falling on the viewer announces that the dreamer is disobeying God and his punishment is at hand. Seeing the demolition of a wall in a dream indicates the killing of a man. Seeing the wall falling means
